sn35.105:1.1: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati kim upadaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkhan”ti?
sn35.105:3.1: “Cakkhusmim kho, bhikkhave, sati cakkhum upadaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkham …pe…
sn35.105:3.2: manasmim sati manam upadaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukham dukkham.
sn35.105:5.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.105:7.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya uppajjeyya ajjhattam sukham dukkhan”ti?
sn35.105:11.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.105:13.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya uppajjeyya ajjhattam sukham dukkhan”ti?
sn35.105:17.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.105:19.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya uppajjeyya ajjhattam sukham dukkhan”ti?
sn35.105:21.1: “Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe… manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.105:21.2: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.105:21.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
